translations: n．牧师住宅：教堂附近的牧师住宅，供牧师及其家庭居住。
· The old parsonages were often built next to the church.
旧的牧师住宅通常建在教堂旁边。

sentences.sentence: I've lived in this one most of my life, and I've visited in a good many others, because my father's friends and most of our relatives also lived in parsonages.
sentences.translation: 我还去许多教区牧师住宅造访，因为父亲的朋友和我们家大多数亲戚都住在那种住宅里。
